website_summaries.verdict: This generously sized TV offers a breathtaking, theater-like performance.  Excellent picture quality with good streaming capabilities.
pros: One of the best pictures available in this price range
High Dynamic Range provides stunning depth and contrast
Gamers and movie buffs will like the excellent motion rate for smooth, crisp action
cons: Not as many smart TV features as competing models

customer_reviews.title: Defective - horizontal line across screen
customer_reviews.text: A couple weeks after it arrived, a horizontal black line appeared near the bottom. I saw the exact same thing on the same model that was on display at Best Buy. Samsung says they will send a technician. But they only come on weekdays, which is very inconvenient. They expect me to take a day off work just so they can fix their defect? Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Alex B

customer_reviews.title: Great all around T
customer_reviews.text: Great all around T.V., especially if your a gamer. This could be the best gaming t.v. on the market for Xbox one X and S users. It now supports FreeSync. With FreeSync selected in game mode on my Xbox one X, I've noticed an improvement in an already impressive response time with this T.V.. The Nu8000 also has a great picture. The upscaling is great for streaming t.v., like sling. Excellent for sports.
customer_reviews.author: Sean K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture
customer_reviews.text: WOW--Fantastic picture, easy to use remote and Bixby verbal command. I have a SONY HD and a Panasonic Plasma in other rooms. This TV puts those to shame. Watched World Cup Soccer right out of the box-and the colors were simply outstanding (our cable TV supplier is not known to provide a superior picture either). No motion blur, no dark corners, and no "rain effect" when they pan the camera. Careful with the stand! While I intended to wall mount, the stand is plastic with easily breakable required plastic tabs. If you want a great UHD TV, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: No longer a Samsung fan
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of Samsung TVs for a few years. This one has changed my mind. First, there are tons of apps and "sponsored" content in the SmartTV menu you simply can't remove. It's in the way, annoying, not useful at all, and needs to go. Second, the TV software is extremely glitchy. The screen goes black, it stops responding to its remote, it loses connection to the cable box, it loses connection to the Sonos Beam, it randomly turns itself off--and most issues the only solution is to pull the power plug. So far, Samsung support's only answer is factory reset, which of course does nothing useful.
customer_reviews.author: GSUBSU

customer_reviews.title: So much better than LG
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace a 49" LG HD flat screen. I couldn't believe the difference in the quality of the picture and how fast the SmartTV features ran. The TV was super easy to set up and the quality is bar none. It has plenty of HDMI ports and works great with our Samsung BluRay player. A HUGE upgrade. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Samsung 65" TV
customer_reviews.text: Received the Televizion today. Box had really been through it. After ppening, I have noticed an unusual amount of dirt and dust on the back of the tv. This item is clearly not new. It has been sitting out somewhere. This was the first time I have purchased a television from Amazon. Probably my last. Hoping the TV will even work.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Feagle

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have had this television for less than a week. It worked for a few days and now it only cycles on and off repeatedly (never really comes completely on). Have to unplug it to turn it off. I requested that the television be replaced; however, this was not an option provided. Bad experience all around.
customer_reviews.author: Snowdogs

customer_reviews.title: Now That's a TV!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this TV . . . . and I was against getting anything new at first because our old TV was working fine! The size, the clarity, the narrow frame (almost invisible), ease of operation can't be beaten. With just this 1 remote we can switch from our cable provide channels, to Netflix, Amazon Prime Video and scroll the internet. I did a lot of research before purchasing, and I definitely recommend this is the TV to get!
customer_reviews.author: Rhoda Cataleta

customer_reviews.title: Great for watching football
customer_reviews.text: The picture is excellent compared to my high end 1080P 5 year old 55" LG I really enjoy watching it.This TV came from Walt's TV who were a pleasure to work with. The only negative thing was that the TV came with the 2 foot mount instead of the T mount shown in the picture which caused a difficult situation because the TV stand I have has a spindle railing along the top and can accommodate up to 46 " and the footprint of the 2 foot mount is 48" wide so I had to mount it on the wall and Walt's TV sent me a wall mount free of charge to mount it on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: mfarina01

customer_reviews.title: Not a true 4K, but excelent all the same.
customer_reviews.text: I love the tv. It does a nice job on rpg games. It has far more detail then I expected. I had to tweak the settings to get it were I liked. The menu was not straight forward at first, but now I figured it oit I like just fine. This is not a true 4K. It is a uhd. 4k is a advertising stunt. Personally I don't care, the picture is stunning. But for the purists and to call out the fake advertising, I wanted to mention it.
customer_reviews.author: Ed K.

customer_reviews.title: The box came pretty chewed up
customer_reviews.text: The box came pretty chewed up, but the double packaging saved it. I was also concerned when I watched the delivery man roll it end over end to get it to my front door. Again, the great packing saved it. We love the color and clarity-and it is amazing what 5 extra inches from our previous TV would feel so much bigger. Yes, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wrong description beware
customer_reviews.text: In two different places on description says refresh rate/motion rate 240 mhz it is not it's 120 I specifically bought this thinking it was 240
customer_reviews.author: joseph r rider

customer_reviews.title: Best TV Ever
customer_reviews.text: My first Samsung TV ( Price was sometimes a showstopper ) but wanted the best TV I could buy and got it . User Friendly , smart TV with plenty of Apps with easy access - along with the Samsung sound bar has made my viewing experience the best ever. I have had RCA, LG , Toshiba , GE, and years ago a Zenith or two , they all had one thing in common - they aren't as good as Samsung - PS - I don't work for or own stock in Samsung :)
customer_reviews.author: Hugh D. Marron

customer_reviews.title: Super Clear Picture
customer_reviews.text: I had an older model 75" TV and decided to upgrade for more HDMI ports and just a newer better picture. I have a Samsung in my bedroom I like so purchased this model for my living room. I've had it hooked up for several weeks now and still can't get over the picture quality and easy set-up. I have a new Sony receiver, Apple TV, Firestick and cable box hooked to it and the remote works it all. Very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: D. Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: The only wifi-enabled object in the house that regularly drops connections and then has problems reconnecting to the wireless network. Everything else works fine - three computers, two tablets, two phones, security systems, and two other TV's all work fine and have no problems reconnecting if there is a problem. There are frequent stretches where this TV just WILL NOT connect to the internet, which renders it pretty much useless in a household that gets its content almost exclusively from streaming. UPDATE: I've had to start using a Roku on a smart TV to get smart TV capability, because the Samsung hardware is just that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Samsung removed Twitch app
customer_reviews.text: WTF no avi file support, now removing the Twitch app. My next TV will be LG.
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture but Technical Issues
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased this TV as a replacement for an old plasma. The picture is phenomenal. The problem I'm have is that the "Audio Return Channel" is not working properly, so the television is not sending audio back to my home theater receiver. This feature worked at first, but after about a week, it stopped working. Since my cables are run through the walls, it's not so easy to add an optical audio cable to the system. Would have been much more convenient to have the audio travel back over the same HDMI Cable. This is very disappointing. A bug that, hopefully, Samsung will fix soon.
customer_reviews.author: geckel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gaming mode.
customer_reviews.text: Words cannot explain going from a 2015 Samsung 42" led to a 2019 82"! Just make sure you get permission from the wife first.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin York

customer_reviews.title: After a month, problems arose
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was very happy with the picture quality, it was gorgeous. However after a month I noticed blurring on fast moving images as well as floating artifacts. I thought it was just the video game I was playing at the time. A few days later, very noticeable gray vertical line appeared in the center of my screen to where everything on one side was a shade darker than the other as well as smaller moving vertical lines when you had a very bright screen you could see. Thankfully, Amazon allowed me to return the TV for a refund. Samsung quality has apparently dropped in recent years.....
customer_reviews.author: Christian Harper

customer_reviews.title: Picture does not work
customer_reviews.text: Amazon says we can't comment on shipping of the product. Product has black lines all over and HUGE black patch in left corner! Picture is really bad. Material is very poor. Sound quality average. NEVER AGAIN any Samsung TV!!!
customer_reviews.author: hellocalifornia

customer_reviews.title: Picture is WOW
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic picture. The shows look e-dimensional, with the background noticeably out of focus. Easy setup. The remote is surprisingly simple, since most of the options are software controlled and on the screen. My previous TV was also a Samsung, so there were no changes I needed to make to my other equipment. I am not rating the sound, since I have a receiver that is 5.1 capable. I have 6 speakers, counting the subwoofer.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew N Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Buy a Vizio
customer_reviews.text: I didn't not order the curved one. But the one i got was bent almost. Also had vertical banding worse than any tv I've ever seen. It's edge lit. And you can tell. The bezel is so thin that you can see the led in the bottom right corner. Settings out of the box make everything look like cheap ad. Lots of contrast blurring. Almost makes everything look very grainy. Can't recommend this to anyone. 1300 for edge lit junk. Pfft
customer_reviews.author: Henry Ducard

customer_reviews.title: Small screen fault
customer_reviews.text: Good picture, easy to setup, the only complaint I have is a small white line along the bottom border, did some research and it is common with LCD screens as it is called "LCD bleeding", white line only appears with certain colors, but with today's technology this should not happen. This is why I only gave 4/5 stars as this white line is not on my 55" Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Remote won't stay connected. Shipping large TV's is unreliable
customer_reviews.text: Just buy a TV locally -- these giant TV's don't ship well. I had to get a replacement because the first one came shattered and the second one has a crack in the plastic housing on the back but I decided to keep it. I've had this TV for over 7 months now and it gets annoying how often you have to resync the Bluetooth only remote or force restart the TV because it won't respond. I'd expect a lot more from a TV this expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Anoinimouse

customer_reviews.title: This is a great TV!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Zero problems and couldn't be happier with it. I was initially going to connect a sound bar, but it's not necessary. This TV has great sound and when the built in equalizer is activated, the sound is fantastic. The picture is crystal clear and while we're all waiting for some REAL 4K TV programs to be available (GET WITH IT CABLE COMPANIES! If Direct TV can do it, you should be ashamed! I have no idea if an extra $1200.00 for a QLED would have a better picture, but I think this one is flawless. Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin G

customer_reviews.title: The TV can’t keep up
customer_reviews.text: The TV constantly stops and starts like a jitter or the TV can’t keep up. It is very annoying to watch.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work correctly
customer_reviews.text: This TV does not work properly with online services such as Amazon Prime and Netflix. Works ok for cable TV
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Bakin

customer_reviews.title: Picture screen is defective.
customer_reviews.text: I sent a repair request to Samsung. It has been two weeks and they do not have the replacement picture panel. They will not take the TV back and give me a new TV that works. Samsung's service is terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Farmer

customer_reviews.title: This replaces our 46” samsung, but seems not as sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Our 240 hz 46” samsung 7000 series i think has a better picture. I am not impressed. You have to sign up and create an account to use it. The tv set descriptions on samsung are sooooo confusing. I think you loose image quality when not viewing square to the screen.sometimes the i age is acceptable but there is something just not wowing my eyeballs. My father in law has the 8500 curved screen and it came with the one box cable solution...i am just not sold .the edges to me wash out . I dunno. Oled, qled...oh and there are no analog connections for this set. Yeah inknow i know....
customer_reviews.author: John Penrose

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding picture!
customer_reviews.text: Great set! The only negative that I have is you can only connect a Samsung blue tooth headset. I had 3 other blue tooth headsets that were different mfg. The only one that would connect is a Samsung product.
customer_reviews.author: Bob L

customer_reviews.title: Overall happy with my purchase and getting happier everyday.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am happy with the TV. The viewing angle is really good and the picture is great, even in my bright living room. Glare is not a problem either. The remote control and the speaker output are the only things I dont like. The remote doesnt have buttons for most functions, you have to use voice commands and that's hard to get used to. I ordered a Samsung sound bar and sub, they work great with the TV and remote. I replaced a Mitsubishi 82" rear projection from 2009 that finally gave up. I am more happy with this purchase everyday as I get used to it and would do it again.
customer_reviews.author: cory b.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the TV. We download Smart-thing app from our iPhone. But the tv remote won’t let us press the button to continue setting up the TV. So we then try to find The Samsung tv brand that we bought in Smart-Thing. which was Samsung UN65NU8000FXZA. But it wasn’t there. We went with the next one Samsung UN65NU8500FXZA... It worked. LOVE SAMSUNG SMART TV. I had an old Sony TV from 2011 that just got mess up. Before it got mess up. My husband wanted a SMART TV. But I hesitated until the Sony TV got mess up. BEST SMART TV!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thirin Has

customer_reviews.title: A great TV
customer_reviews.text: I felt strange ordering a large TV through Amazon, but it was at a good price and was much easier and efficient than any that I've purchased in the past. The delivery team was very careful and did a great job. Needless to say, this is a very large TV and requires at least 2 people if you want to mount it on a wall. Setup for me was simple and I didn't need to change any of the picture settings in order to get a great picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Terrific 4K TV
customer_reviews.text: I was shopping for a reasonably priced 4K smart TV for my son who is away at college. The previously donated 13 year old Samsung 46" set finally died and it wasn't worth repairing. I got the 49" model for $650 and I must say, for that price, it absolutely could not be beat. The sound quality was surprisingly good and the picture quality is outstanding. Getting started was easy, wall mounting was also easy and all in all, we're completely satisfied with the purchase. Unless you're going with OLED or QLED, at this price point this Samsung is a no-brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F.

customer_reviews.title: Should've bought a Sony
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is terrible! After hours of adjusting the settings of this advertising nightmare, I thought I had it dialed in. A second later, some auto adjustment kicked in & washed out the screen. Screen flickers constantly too. Anything computer generated is good but everything else is pathetic.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional video editor. I use this monitor as my client monitor. The Picture is superb and the smart features are fantastic. I also like the functionality of the remote. My only criticism is that there is no analog audio output. I used an optical to audio converter to power my external analog speakers. (PROZOR Digital to Analog Converter DAC Digital SPDIF Toslink to Analog Stereo Audio L/R Converter Adapter with Optical Cable for PS3 Xbox HD DVD PS4 Home Cinema Systems AV Amps Apple TV)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this TV if you watch sports
customer_reviews.text: I Bought this for sports. The juttering on sports is awful. Samsung technical support says there is a firmware issue. I have no idea how a company can continue to sell a TV with known firmware issues. I am so disappointed with this purchase as the 11 year old sharp I replaced had zero issues
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the product
customer_reviews.text: Hi Shortly after receiving the television approximately 3 months of limited use, we have an issue with the hand held remote. The tv does not respond to commands except for the off and on switch. I tried closing and opening the tv, and finally removed batteries and re-installed new batteries. After numerous attempts I found that the remote is defective and only works if I remove the cover......very annoying!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cinimodcan

customer_reviews.title: Chose new 2018 model because of the base
customer_reviews.text: I have had ten Samsung TVs over the years and more than a dozen Samsung monitors. I think they are overwhelmingly the best you can get. We chose the 2018, 55 inch model (series 8) (instead of the 2019 model because it has a solid base. All the 2019 models have "legs" which are wider apart than the piece of furniture that we were going to set it on. The TV has a typical great Samsung picture and audio.
customer_reviews.author: pachella

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional picture. Exceptional value.
customer_reviews.text: This TV is exceptional overall! The picture is unbelievable. The sound quality is well above average for built-in speakers. This was a top-rated Best Buy in Consumer Reports Magazine and using their guidance we were able to select this first-rate TV.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Jogger

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TV!!!
customer_reviews.text: Picture is amazing, super thin bezel, included stand is also fantastic. If you're going to output optical sound (SPDIF) to an older analog stereo system (RCA) I would HIGHLY recommend this adaptor  set the TV to external speakers and make sure you disable the Dolby AC3 Great TV for gaming, watching movies, or sports. Fantastic all around system.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The TV keeps making cracking noises from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: andres fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, meh interface
customer_reviews.text: Pros: great picture Cons: Wifi disconnects occasionally and has trouble reconnecting Can't cast from Windows 10 PC like it's supposed to Casting from anything works about 50% of the time and often disconnects or requires a restart to work properly Samsung can't decide which app they want you to cast from so they're all kinda half-assed No source buttons. You have to open the home menu and scroll around to the inputs. They can be added to the main menu however Ads on the main menu
customer_reviews.author: William Q.

customer_reviews.title: Light Bleed
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this tv. First one came with light bleeding problem. U can see the light bleed on the entire lower border of the tv. Amazon sent a replacement and the second one came with the same problem. Buyers beware. I m returning both of them.
customer_reviews.author: Stefen

customer_reviews.title: TV is amazing but cant use standard mounting bracket
customer_reviews.text: The TV is amazing. You will love it. BUT Samsung is now making their TV's so you have to buy a Samsung mounting bracket for the wall as well. I was able to measure the holes in the tv and go to Home Depot and buy the bolts I needed but a standard mounting bracket wont work with the hardware they provide. It makes it a pain. I will stick with LG from now on. Samsung also doesnt have the YouTubeTV app but LG does.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great Picture Quality and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality on this is better than I expected, and though I have seen people complain about the user interface, I found it very easy to use and intuitive. Side viewing is good to the limits of such a thing - it was very clear out out until the viewing angle became two extreme to really see the image at all. Brightness is great, and blacks are good. Our last TV was a Vivio, and this is in a whole different - and much better - class. We are very pleased with this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: My best TV so far!
customer_reviews.text: Got this delivered today and set it up immediately. I must say this is the smartest bit of tech in our house. The setup was completely seamless; the TV recognized the antenna and both of our other units, recognized our use of satellite, offered all of the other services we use and set those up as well, asking only for the needed security information. The picture is amazing! The remote control is the most sparsely populated one I've ever seen, but operates without a hitch--very intuitive. I'm looking forward to years of good service here! Samsung hits it out of the park every time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Possible Hardware defect.  May need to return.
customer_reviews.text: May need to send back. Having issues with streaming. Made major changes to wifi setup including hard wire of Orbi Router. Streaming and live TV continues to have issues.
customer_reviews.author: Louie (Phoenix, AZ)

customer_reviews.title: Mind Blowing Picture
customer_reviews.text: Delivered right on time by two great Amazon workers. Me and two friends unboxed it, set it up and had it up and running in less than 90 minutes. A fantastic Picture.m and a wonderfully designed chassis with almost no bezel showing. Very easy to adjust the picture to my liking. Whitest Whites Maithili Blackest Black’s and Billions and Billions of Colors. Really a wise choice. A 5 Star TV.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Mells

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: We bought this particular tv because it fit perfectly into our shelves and was highly rated. It's working great so far. We mainly use it for xbox. The tv seems to recognize the xbox connection and sends a signal to the xbox to turn it on. Pretty slick. The tv has both wifi and ethernet connections and has lots of apps (we haven't tried) and lots of hdmi connections. The only thing I don't like is the stand because it sits in front of the tv so it forces you to have the tv recessed on shelf a bit. Not a big deal but we'd rather have the stand sit behind the tv.
customer_reviews.author: John from Denver

customer_reviews.title: One TV to rule them all
customer_reviews.text: Every time I turn it on, I'm excited to see it do TV things. The picture is clear and sharp, with just a hint of whimsy. It's a smart tv, but it stops short of being too smart. It's like a B- student who works hard. The remote is cute as a baby's smile and small as a baby's foot...which is probably why it's always getting lost between the cushions of our new couch or the ample curves of my old lady. It's so intuitive that my cat can use it, but he's an idiot so we just end up watching the Grit channel or the screen saver. Anyone want to buy a used cat?
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Terrific

customer_reviews.title: Last years model and full of features.  Amazing Picture
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase. I did buy a sound bar although the sound is amazing for a tv. The picture is out of this world. The depth of color and the vibrancy will take your breath away. The smart features work as they should. I hardwired the my wifi and anytime I access the internet it is FAST. The remote is quite small and there is a slight learning curve to it. However in this day and age our brains seems wired to adapt easily. I would not hesitate to purchase this again and recommend it to anyone on the fence.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Good TV
customer_reviews.text: Kids ruin my VIZIO 48" so got this one for Xmas for the family. It's a HUGE TV, but I like it. Picture quality and sound is not top notch, but it's a $1K TV so I don't expect the QLED quality. Picture is a little bit darker than my VIZIO. I don't know much about the longevity of the TV yet, but will update as time goes by. From what I experienced so far, it's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: FB: #EggrollQueen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before I purchased. I love video games and was looking for a TV that would give me the performance I needed to pair with my Xbox One and still allow for a great viewing experience when we watched movies and shows. I couldn't be happier. Picture is amazing! Best Tv out there for video games. Remote takes some getting used to and performs adequately. Voice feature needs some work, but, my cable provider does an excellent job there, so, no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Movement and refresh rate is poor
customer_reviews.text: The refresh is sub-par. Image on moving objects would shudder at times and blur. Would not recommend this model. I own other Samsung TVs and did not have the same problems. Even though ordered as Amazon Prime, I was charged $30 to return.
customer_reviews.author: JON F.

customer_reviews.title: Set-up waaay more complex than anticipated.
customer_reviews.text: I have not removed the TV from the box because I'm afraid of violating the elaborate precautionary instructions regarding improper handling. The unit is going to be installed on a TV "pedestal" base, not attached to the wall. Upon paying in full for the unit (I chose the 5-payment method) I will regretfully have to hire an experienced installer and hope for the best in installing the unit. In the meantime I'll prey there is nothing wrong with the unit requiring warranty fixing. NOT A REAL HAPPY CAMPER
customer_reviews.author: TnDon.

customer_reviews.title: Nice display
customer_reviews.text: Samsung continues to lead the pack in consumer video. The wife and I aren't getting any younger, so we decided to upgrade to a larger, brighter LCD than we had previously. Absolutely thrilled with this purchase. Hockey games are crisp and clear, movies are fantastic, subtitles are easy to see and being able to run youtube and other media apps right on the display is great, too. Included remote is really nice. Built in sound is a bit low, but that's easily fixed by using the surround sound amp instead. I'd definitely recommend this model.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Perye - Rogue Estate BBQ

customer_reviews.title: I gave you 1000.00 now show me ads all the time.
customer_reviews.text: 1 star review, pending resolution of ridiculous ads showing on home page/menu page of Television *from Samsung*. This is not in "Retail Mode", this is normal at home use. Incredibly arrogant and presumptive of company.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Solid TV
customer_reviews.text: We’ve got 3 large Samsungs now and have been consistently using only Samsung for our TVs since like 2005. For us they’ve always been really high quality and any issues in the past (which I can’t even remember) were quickly addressed.
customer_reviews.author: sw21788

customer_reviews.title: not good for viewing sports
customer_reviews.text: I bought the tv after reading a lot of reviews of 49 in tvs in this price range. The picture on the tv was good for everything except sports. I watch a lot of basketball, and there was significant bluring of motion and none of the adjustments to settings (as recommended by Samsung, or as found on the web) fixed the problem. I returned this unit for this reason and will be trying a Sony x900F instead, which I understand has the best processing at this level for a 49 inch tv.
customer_reviews.author: Fisher Man

customer_reviews.title: Big beautiful picture.
customer_reviews.text: Love the clear quality picture. So many fine details we couldn’t see with our last tv. The size of the screen is perfect. The sound isn’t as good as I had hoped but could get a sound bar to help.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed with this TV. While watching football it’s has a really bad trail on the football. For this price I would expect a better quality picture. The remote control is complete junk. I also have a sound bar hooked up via optical output and sometimes I can control the volume, but most the time is does nothing. You can see the red light blink on the tv, but nothing happens. Always been a Samsung tv guy, but will look elsewhere after this ripoff.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas H.

customer_reviews.title: Delivered from Amazon faster than best buy would have.
customer_reviews.text: It is huge, 4k and responsive for gaming. I wish that the fourth HDMI port had eARC rather than ARC (but it may be possible for that to get fixed in a firmware update) I hadnt thought about getting a dolby atmos surround sound when buying the tv... I suppose I can connect the ps4 to the surround sound and use it to switch devices, but I like that the tv can automatically turn on when powing on the ps4, which isnt possible using the surround sound as an HDMI switch.
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Significant wireless problems
customer_reviews.text: After 11 months, wireless connectivity was so bad I called and went through extensive testing with Samsung online. They sent a repair person who replaced all the main parts after confirming the wifi module had failed. A week and a half later and the problems are back. I can't stream for more than about 15 minutes without losing connection, if I can get on at all. I'm guessing it's a flaw in either how they engineered the components or their production, so replacing may not help. Works with Roku and other inputs, so I'll probably just end up using one of those rather than possible repeat repair visits or just giving up and having an expensive boat anchor.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Misleading refresh rate
customer_reviews.text: Motion Rate 240 is a lie. It really only supports 120 refresh rate and ONLY does this for TV and no other connection. I bought this because Samsung was pushing the XBOX gaming tv features when it only works with XBOX and no PC connections. I exhausted the technical custom options and workarounds to no success. Samsung support was of no help. $775 for a TV that's really not worth it. Looks the same as TV half the cost, not true refresh, the remote is basic, nothing thrilling about the picture. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: BuyerZero

customer_reviews.title: The remote is a problem
customer_reviews.text: The TV is fine, but the remote is horrible. Several times a week it just stops working and I can’t use the tv at all. I have tried all kinds of fixes, changed out brand new batteries one after another, it just won’t work. I’m so disappointed because otherwise this is a good product
customer_reviews.author: kathleen l hitt

customer_reviews.title: Two days in, white blotches and banding.
customer_reviews.text: Yep, this showed up Friday and Sunday night, while watching the credits to True Detective, I see white blotches and even some black banding. I tried other shows on other streaming networks and still the same spots. On a $2K TV, I'm rather disappointed. Amazon is picking it up at the end of the week. It's sad because the 4K clarity and colors look amazing, but there is no way I can keep an item that has issues on day 2, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Astrofreq

customer_reviews.title: Samsung Smart TVs are my favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Great TV. Beautiful picture. Sound is good. Set up with home network is easy. Love the easy-to-use Samsung Tech Support Chat and Remote technical support. My cat stepped on my DirecTV remote control and turned on a Voice Guide feature. I couldn't figure out how to turn it off. I went to the Samsung.com Tech Support Chat feature and communicated with a technician. I approved the tech to remote into my TV and the Voice Guide was turned off within a matter of minutes. It was great!
customer_reviews.author: OmaTeresa

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this waste.
customer_reviews.text: I paid over $950 for this TV. The picture quality is horrendous. I pay for the most expensive best internet my provider has. But still the picture comes in and out in the TV. Some points you can’t even make out faces it’s a total blur. I’m fuming... $950 on a total piece of junk.... There are also lines in the screen that are always on the bottom of the picture
customer_reviews.author: Amber McClellan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Picture Quality, Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Great TV. Picture quality is amazing, love the 4K crystal clear display. Smart Feature are easy to navigate and you have the ability to download apps. The remote is simple and sleek. So far my wife and I love this tv. Prior to purchasing I did a lot of research and read reviews on a bunch of 55-60” TVs. The rating for this tv were high, the price was good, but I read quite a few reviews about loud popping noises produced by the tv. I just want to say I haven’t had any issues with this at all and we use the tv offer.
customer_reviews.author: Adam K.

customer_reviews.title: Buy if you are not expecting much-
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. The rate on refresh isn't exactly to be proud of. Internal speakers are hollow. An adjustment of 10-20 milliseconds is neccessary for viewing in a typical livingroom. Setup was quick, unencumbered and basic. The 'push-through' was ok. I hate the remote. Samsung doesn't support most 'AI1' Remotes.. That's a big folly- oops! Samsung missed the mark. A $2000 smart-tv, should have better ability.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Ross Stewart Andrew CPSE WACS ACF AAC

customer_reviews.title: Sensational Picture
customer_reviews.text: I was watching an ordinary Samsung HD TV for so long that I didn't realize how much better ultra high def is. I am completely blown away by the picture's sharpness, brightness, and vivid colors. My only criticisms are the limited usefulness of the remote (just about everything is on-screen menu driven), and the need to buy an audio converter to be able to use my existing home theater setup.
customer_reviews.author: Rocketman

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for a 40" Vizio. We moved into a slightly larger room and this was perfect. The picture quality is excellent - easily viewable from multi angles and setup with DirecTV was super simple. We also added a Samsung sound bar, which isn't absolutely necessary, but a definite must if you want full rich sound.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Cummings

customer_reviews.title: A great television for the price !  But sound quality is not good.
customer_reviews.text: I love this TV except one thing; and it's a big thing ! The sound quality is very lacking! I have turned this TV up to 87 ( out of 100 ), and I Still have trouble hearing some shows. My other TV is a Panasonic ( 9 years old ). If I turn it to 13 or 14, it's LOUD ! I am really disappointed with this ' problem'. Am I not doing something I should be doing ?
customer_reviews.author: Jeri S.

customer_reviews.title: 2 months old and problems already....
customer_reviews.text: While originally happy with this TV, I need to downgrade it to 2 stars since I now lost Smart Hub features and remote is unresponsive. Update at the 5 months mark: More problem with the Smart Hub feature. TV becomes completely frozen and Samsung support's help was to Reset the TV...very useful. Anytime you do that, you have to reset the TV again, download Apps, sign again to all of them, etc...
customer_reviews.author: Eric M. Romain

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for its money. Delivery guys - not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing TV for its money. Especially if you have a Samsung phone with Smart Things - the setup process is a breeze. Picture quality is unprecedented for this price (I got it for 599) Yes, there is a bunch of ads on the main screen, but if you spend most of your time paying games etc (using HDMI that is) that won't be a problem. Bad news is the package was open when I received it, and my TV arrived damaged (yes), with a corner of the back case trashed. Nothing a duct tape can't fix, but still sad. Thankfully the way the delivery guys handled it haven't affected the picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Igor Belkin

customer_reviews.title: awesome !
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome tv, great price on sale ! This tv has a perfect picture right out of the box even though most people said to disable the power saver mode to make it right ! The only thing I did not like is the remote , it's bare bones and takes some time to figure out how to use it but I'm ok with it now, it helps to watch the how-to video ! It was very easy, even for me , to assemble the tv stand and attach to the tv ! Highly recommend this tv !!!
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice Miller

customer_reviews.title: Clear and crisp picture
customer_reviews.text: Great TV and easy setup (I didn't wall mount it). I like the smart features as well which I didn't expect to use at all when I ordered it, but now I use it all the time for Netflix, Youtube, and Spotify. It integrates nicely with my Xbox One X and Vizio sound bar so I can use the one TV remote for everything. Also auto turns on game mode on it's own for the Xbox and does it at the correct times. So easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but quality...
customer_reviews.text: No matter what you are watching...John Wayne and Kirk Douglas in the western "The War Wagon" or Tiger Woods playing golf or your favorite Sunday afternoon NFL team on the gridiron...this TV does it all. The price and the quality are awesome...it is 4K!! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Samsung quality is not good and customer service is worse
customer_reviews.text: Only had this thing for a year and it started giving me problems with connection to internet and turning on ... the customer service wasted a lot of time telling me it’s resolved until the mere one year warranty expired . Good picture quality but This will probably be my last Samsung purchase ever . Terrible quality as well as customer support .
customer_reviews.author: Headphone Master

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: TV was delivered about 11 am, Monday, April 8, ahead of schedule. TV was easy to unpack and assemble. Having fun figuring out all of its feature. Had little hiccup getting remote paired to our cable box but Samsung Remote Support took care of the problem for me!! Previous reviews had mentioned annoying "ads" but I just don't click on them!! Replaced our 10 year old LG Plasma with this Samsung!! Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Nix

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Picture
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I have been missing out. 4K and live action. Lots of settings. You need knowledge to set up correctly. Use HDMI 4 to your Receiver. Get better HDMI cables.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Decent tv
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the tv repaired twice under warranty because it turns off and then on randomly when gaming. Not a fan of the Xbox turning on automatically when I power on the tv. Picture quality is decent. Having the tv replaced with a new one.
customer_reviews.author: 2010n

customer_reviews.title: Started Rebooting a Day After Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about 8 hours now just reboots over and over and over with nothing on screen. Submitted a service request. Will update after Samsung attempts to repair. Very disappointed purchased for quality of name brand.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Manning

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, simple setup
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality is outstanding. The tv was very simple to set up and the settings are very straight forward. The sound wasn't aweful, but I added a sound bar, which made it markedly better.
customer_reviews.author: Shea G.

customer_reviews.title: Recent Ui update ruin Ux
customer_reviews.text: A recent update made the "Live TV" channel list a pain to use. Instead of having my saved channels show first the update made it where you can not change it from "On Now" back to saved channels. I have to dig down several clicks to get to my saved channels list now every time I want to hop channels. The On now option only shows what it wants you to see, not what you want to see. I gonna go back to using my Tivo's.
customer_reviews.author: +Fred Evans

customer_reviews.title: Samsung 8 series flat 65" 4k
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a fantastic TV. Sound is better than most but I use a soundbar. Remote is not real user friendly but I mostly use the remote for my Bose soundbar or the remote for Cox contour. Colors and picture quality are terrific. 4K is stunning. Purchased this rather than QLED. Could not justify the extra cost for QLED, certainly cannot see the difference unless they are side by side.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Duggan

customer_reviews.title: No AMD FREESNYC on the 49''
customer_reviews.text: They should have just called this 49" tv something other then NU8000. You get a 60hz panel not a 120 like all the others. Then i found out after trying to get my PC to let me turn the FreeSnyc on. It says on Samsungs web page that it dose not suport Freesnyc on the 49" model........ I bought this TV over other just for the freesnyc. Sound is not to bad. TV looks great.
customer_reviews.author: jerry

customer_reviews.title: 55 inches
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I was expecting a bit more of this product. When I saw it in the stores, the picture seems a lot more clear. I got a 55 inches, which I think is a good size. The channel options is very limited too. I had to use a roku to get regular channels. I wish it will let you download more. Overall the tv is good. Easy to install, nice slick control remote but picture is disappointing, too dark and blurry.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome TV
customer_reviews.text: This was a upgrade from my other Samsung that was 6 yrs old. It was sleek, lightweight, very easy to set up. it pretty much did it all on its own. Picture quality was beautiful. and shipping was fast with no damage. Im very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Dobson

customer_reviews.title: You can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful TV with excellent picture quality and fits exactly where I needed it. The installation instructions are excellent very easy to follow. The remote control feels a bit small and is easily a loss because it’s all black. Learning the voice control on this remote make up for any negative it may have The sound quality is not the best but it’s tolerable. I totally recommend this TV .
customer_reviews.author: Errison D. Zelaya Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Samsung TV to replace an older Vizio that had developed sound problems. I expected it to have a sharper picture than the older Vizio. It did not. The screen is extremely fragile. It shattered with very little mistaken pressure after a week's usage, as I repositioned the set. My bad, I suppose--packaging gave warning. If you buy one, don't ever even touch the screen. I chose the Samsung because I had an older Samsung that is a great TV. I would not, however, buy this TV or any of its siblings again in a million years.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Greene

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use,
customer_reviews.text: Love the picture. Easy to use. Have my tv hooked up to receiver. Don’t use tv audio.
customer_reviews.author: NF

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 4K UHD Smart TV with HDR
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this TV except for one thing: I didn't like about this product is the Samsung minimalist remote. It's a pain to use. Get a good universal remote (SONY or better) and program it to control Samsung TVs. You will be much happier and get speedier access to features!
customer_reviews.author: Gandalf The Grey

customer_reviews.title: Bigger is better, right?
customer_reviews.text: Yes we went bigger and this TV did not disappoint! The delivery guys handled it with utmost care and even unboxed it and made sure it was working perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: mobesmom

customer_reviews.title: First ever Amazon review
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never been one to leave feedback for products I’ve purchased, but this TV is so horrible, I had to go out of my way to do it after fighting with it for over a year. The network connectivity is terrible, and it regularly tells me my WiFi password is incorrect (it’s not). The smart features are not user friendly compared to the competition, and are rarely functional. I can rarely AirPlay. Optical audio doesn’t work. Remote is starting to behave erratically. Won’t play external audio on my Bose system, when other TVs will with the same hardware. I’ve always appreciated Samsung’s quality over other brands, but never again will I buy a Samsung TV.
customer_reviews.author: Sackjarama

customer_reviews.title: SMDH !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Assembled TV... peeled off screen protectors carefully.... plugged it in and with great expectations, turned it on, only to find that the screen was internally cracked and TV was not Viewable... SMDH !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Mason

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding picture!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought a 65" for our summer home and were blown away by the picture. It seems like to show was in you living room. So I bought the 82" and it is just as great just bigger. Love it. Would recommend to anyone serious about watching a lot of television.
customer_reviews.author: Geryl W. Darington

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful TV
customer_reviews.text: This tv is INCREDIBLE. Using Apple 4K and Xbox One X. The picture quality is the best I’ve ever seen. 4K videos are insane. 4K gaming is crazy!!! Never experienced anything like it. I love it. Was skeptical about having something like this shipped to my front door. But the box was in perfect shape and I live in a nice area. Still wouldn’t leave it on the front porch for long. Nothing is over the picture and name brand on the box.
customer_reviews.author: J. White

customer_reviews.title: Good picture but slow refresh rate
customer_reviews.text: The add claims it has a 240hz refresh rate, but this picture cannot keep up with some picture motions. Scenes that move or pan from left to right or visa-versa or up/down are jerky. I am extremely disappointed with this TV. If you want high speed motion quality, I would not recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Tranchina

product_meta.title: Samsung UN55NU8000FXZA Flat 55" 4K UHD 8 Series Smart LED TV (2018)
product_meta.description: Size:55-Inch| Style:TVLoaded with features, the NU8000 has advanced smart browsing with voice control, which finds your shows easily. Stunning depth of HDR Plus and millions of additional colors than HDTVs create a breathtaking 4K picture.
feature_bullets: HDR Plus: See movies and shows just as the director intended in stunning high dynamic range
Ultra Slim Array: The Ultra Slim Array dynamically fine tunes the deepness of the blacks, to the brightness of the whites, for a picture with sensational contrast
Dynamic Crystal Color: Discover an expanded world of colors where millions of shades HDTVs can’t replicate make all the difference
Motion Rate 240: Enjoy smooth, crisp action even in the fastest scenes. Product Size (W x H x D) Without Stand 48.3 x 28 x 2.2 Inch. Product Size (W x H x D) With Stand: 48.3 x 31 x 12.7 Inch
Smart TV with Bixby Voice: A revolutionary way to help find streaming and live TV shows with a Universal Guide, one remote and voice assistance. Sound Output (RMS):40 Watt

specifications.Special Features: Premium UHD TV; Flat Panel; 360 Design; Samsung OneRemote
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars938 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
